ResearchTabDef.label: Nutrient Paste
ResearchTabDef.generalTitle: Vanilla Nutrient Paste Expanded: Reimagined Progression research projects

ResearchProjectDef.label: nutrient paste system
ResearchProjectDef.description: Integrating a nutient paste fluid pipeline delivery system, automated storage solutions, and development of miniaturized dispenser design.

ResearchProjectDef.label: simple nutrient paste
ResearchProjectDef.description: Analyze and optimize filtration parameters to reduce undesirable flavor compounds in nutrient paste.\n\nThis will require a 66% increase in nutrient paste fluid per portion in comparison to nutrient paste meal.

ResearchProjectDef.label: dripper
ResearchProjectDef.description: Develop a bedside device that feeds a person lying in bed whenever they are hungry.

ResearchProjectDef.label: nutrient paste cubes
ResearchProjectDef.description: Develop preservation techniques for nutrient paste through condensation and dehydration. Great for traveling.\n\nThis will require a 50% increase in nutrient paste fluid per portion of 15 cubes in comparison to nutrient paste meal.

ResearchProjectDef.label: diluted nutrient paste
ResearchProjectDef.description: Explore dilution methods for nutrient paste to increase quantity without substantial nutritional loss. The diluted paste will provide basic sustenance for the body, but the flavor worsens significantly.\n\nThis will require a 33% decrease in nutrient paste fluid per portion in comparison to nutrient paste meal.

ResearchProjectDef.label: feeder
ResearchProjectDef.description: Develop a compact pipeline output that allows colonists and citizens to pick up nutrient paste.

ResearchProjectDef.label: feeding tube
ResearchProjectDef.description: Develop miniaturization techniques for the nutrient paste dripper, allowing it to be integrated onto the bed structure.

ResearchProjectDef.label: fine nutrient paste
ResearchProjectDef.description: Introduce a secondary flavor portion to improve the overall taste experience.\n\nThis will require a 50% increase in nutrient paste fluid per portion in comparison of simple nutrient paste meal.

ResearchProjectDef.label: nutrient paste kibble
ResearchProjectDef.description: Explore possibility of producing animal feed from nutrient paste. The paste kibble will provide basic sustenance for the animal's body, but too dangerous for human consumption.\n\nThis will require a 66% increase in nutrient paste fluid per portion of 50 kibble in comparison to nutrient paste meal.

ResearchProjectDef.label: packaged nutrient paste
ResearchProjectDef.description: Utilize preservation and packaging techniques for nutrient paste to prevent it from spoiling. Great for traveling.\n\nThis will require same volume of nutrient paste fluid per portion in comparison to nutrient paste meal.

ResearchProjectDef.label: hunger suppressor
ResearchProjectDef.description: Develop a multi-tube device that scans for organisms needing nutrition, then uses a dart to connect tube and pump nutrient paste to the target.

ResearchProjectDef.label: lavish nutrient paste
ResearchProjectDef.description: Utilize an innovative process to segment nutrient paste fluid into multiple portions with distinct flavors and solidities, achieving universal appeal.\n\nThis will require a 33% increase in nutrient paste fluid per portion in comparison of fine nutrient paste meal.
